title: R&D Data Scientist Intern
details: Identified and automated key business processes through IT solutions
Designed, developed, and deployed data-driven tools :
Implemented front-end interfaces for new tools (Vue.js)
Built and optimized back-end API routes (MySQL, PHP Laravel)
Developed new data import pipelines (Excel, MySQL, PHP Laravel)
Created automated MySQL database cleaning solutions
Conducted data modeling and analysis (Python, Excel)
Collaborated with international cross-functional teams:
Customer Success (Belgium & Spain)
IT (Sri Lanka & UK)
results: Reduced MySQL database cleaning time by ~4x
context: MAYA Global is a startup providing an AI-powered 360° web platform for smart green management.
Joined the R&D and Data Science team to optimize business processes through data-driven tools.
referee: Valentine G. (Founder & CEO), contact info available on demand
